WITCH: Very good. You’re telling stories,
ray dear, and must be punished. As a
punishment, you will be so good as
to go about offering to kiss everyone
you meet, until further notice.

PIPETTE: What, like this? (SHE STRIKES POSE

WITCH:
Like that.

rA
PIPETTE: But people will think it is so odd.
Kiss me!
WITCH: Yes, they’ll be surprised at first.
PIPETTE: But, I say - gentlemen and all? Kiss
me!
WITCH: Yes, gentlemen and all.
PIPETTE: But they won’t like it. Kiss me!
WITCH: Oh - on the contrary. They won’t mind
a bit!
PIPETTE: But I’m so shy! I can’t even look at
a gentleman without blushing.
WITCH: Oh, you’ll get over your shyness after
a year or two of this sort of thing.
